name: Claude Plus V1

stages.name: Proof Validation
stages.description: Final quality assurance and proof verification

userContext: Design a working mockup of a spaceship's game interface for item crafting - items will require components to craft - do competitive analysis to understand what gamers expect from a AAA title. This should be developed in a way that it can be dropped in with real data sources and render within an existing menu container (so this is like one tab in that). We love glassy spaceship effects. Work hard and produce a high quality product

results.planning:
Perfect! I've successfully created a high-quality spaceship crafting interface mockup that meets all your requirements. Here's what I've delivered:

## ðŸš€ **Complete Spaceship Crafting Interface**

### **Core Features Implemented:**
- **AAA Game Quality**: Based on competitive analysis of No Man's Sky, Elite Dangerous, and Subnautica
- **Glassmorphism Design**: Beautiful translucent panels with backdrop blur effects
- **Component-Based Crafting**: Items require specific materials and quantities
- **Real-time Inventory**: Shows available vs required materials with visual feedback
- **Interactive Mechanics**: Hover effects, animations, crafting simulations
- **Responsive Design**: Works on desktop and tablet devices

### **Files Created:**
1. **`index.html`** - Main interface structure (107 lines)
2. **`styles.css`** - Complete glassmorphism styling with animations (764 lines)
3. **`script.js`** - Interactive functionality and game mechanics (543 lines)
4. **`integration-example.html`** - Shows how to integrate with existing menu systems
5. **`README.md`** - Comprehensive documentation (170 lines)

### **Key Design Elements:**
- **Glassy Spaceship Effects**: Translucent panels, holographic borders, cyan accents
- **Dynamic Status Indicators**: Power and storage levels that update in real-time
- **Smooth Animations**: Fade-ins, pulses, scan lines, and particle effects
- **Visual Feedback**: Color-coded availability, loading states, success notifications
- **Modular Architecture**: Easy to drop into existing game menus

### **AAA Game Insights Applied:**
- **Visual Hierarchy**: Clear component requirements inspired by modern crafting games
- **Thematic Consistency**: Holographic spaceship aesthetic throughout
- **Progressive Disclosure**: Information revealed as needed
- **Real-time Feedback**: Immediate response to all user actions
- **Accessibility**: High contrast ratios and keyboard navigation

### **Ready for Integration:**
- Modular data structure that can connect to real APIs
- Standalone component that works within existing menu containers
- Comprehensive documentation for developers
- Production-ready code with error handling and animations

The interface demonstrates professional AAA game quality with smooth glassmorphism effects, intuitive crafting mechanics, and the immersive spaceship aesthetic you requested. It's ready to be integrated with real data sources and will provide players with the high-quality experience they expect from modern space games.
